subject: Wrong Item
description_text:
I received a phone video amplifier instead of the hand brake and shifter I
ordered.

conversations.body_text: The item order is :    #SSN4641  Tracking Number : JSELD1242731617YQ

Hi Zarni Thway,  We have received your photos. You ordered a blue handbrake and a shifter. The blue handbrake has been shipped, but you received a magnifying glass instead. We have contacted the courier to investigate the issue and will ensure it is resolved. If the item is indeed lost, we will send you a replacement. Please don’t worry.
Hi Zarni Thway,    Could you please peel off the first shipping label and take a photo of the label underneath that is being covered, then send it to us? We need it to check the logistics status.

Hi Zarni Thway,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have noted that this is indeed the incorrect tracking number and package. We will promptly arrange for a replacement shipment.
can i get a new tracking number
Hi Zarni Thway,    Sorry for the delayed response. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047243835388
